posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.37.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here .

Release notes:

  • Now you can easily see the progress of attachment downloads. You can also stop and restart in-progress downloads too. So if a transfer is slowed because you’re on the road (in airplane mode?) or the mediocre hotel WiFi is about to implode, you can wait to reload when more available bandwidth is bestowed.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.36.0-beta.1…v7.37.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

Thanks for being a beta tester!

New Version: 7.37.0-beta.1

56 new commits since 7.36.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.37.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Allow for empty stickerMessage.emoji and quote.authorAci during backup import [2]

  • Target ES2021 [3]

  • Show connecting state before ringing for direct calls [4]

  • Add new release line for testing [5]

  • Improve tap-to-view deletion query [6]

  • Force relays only if remote user is not a Signal Connection [7]

  • Smarter incoming message handling for filter by unread [8]

  • Improve handling of DOE messages in backups [9]

  • Fix lightbox video styles [10]

  • Fix service id conversion in import [11]

  • Verify groupId for group changes [12]

  • Fix long call titles overflowing in calls list [13]

  • Disable message insert triggers during backup import [14]

  • Initial logic for release notes [15]

  • Fix transfer archive timeout [16]

  • Test for roundtripping view-once quotes [17]

  • fix screenshare crash on OSX 14 [18]

  • Upgrade electron to 33.2.1 [19]

  • Send alternate numbers to CDSI [20]

  • Enable filter by unread on production [21]

  • Deprecate check for versioned expire timer capability [22]

  • Highlight the selected conversation when filter by unread is enabled [23]

  • Hydrate redux before updating conversations' last messages after import [24]

  • Upgrade libsignal to v0.63.0 [25]

  • Use new libsignal chat connection types [26]

  • Fix package-lock for node version 20.18.1 [27]

  • Pin libphonenumber in package-lock.json [28]

  • Improve backup conversation message request state handling [29]

  • Ensure long message trimming is unicode-aware [30]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.49.0 [31]

  • Filter by unread: small improvements and unit tests [32]

  • Fix memory usage by batching syncTasks [33]

  • Release notes for 7.36 [34]

  • Update strings [35]

  • Update DNS fallback [36]

  • Fix profile display in direct call connecting state [37]

  • Improve compatibility for max long values in backups [38]

  • Fix importing call links with max expiration time [39]

  • Support device name change sync message [40]

  • Fix crash by updating to ringrtc 2.49.1 [41]

  • Fix composer focus when using message menu to reply in narrow widths [42]

  • Groups: Only set active_at when changes have happened [43]

  • Show attachment download progress, new stop button to cancel [44]

  • On link, ensure group conversations are shown in search [45]

  • Fix UUID Regex when normalizing serviceIds [46]

  • Fix composer focus when using emoji picker and pressing Enter and upgrade focus-trap-react to 10.3.1 [47]

  • Keep profileKey in situations where it didn't work; still fail over [48]

  • Fix custom color backup import/export [49]

  • Backups: update to latest integration tests [50]

  • Update attachment handling [51]

  • Handle fatal error during backup import [52]

  • Handle backup transfer errors during linking [53]

  • Release notes for 7.37 [54]

  • Update strings [55]

  • 7.37.0-beta.1 [56]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.36.0-beta.1…v7.37.0-beta.1
